snippet: Defense attorneys in the Colorado theater shooting case want to see disciplinary records of a police officer who was working on the day of the attack, but the reason wasn't immediately clear....

headline.print_headline: Holmes Lawyers Seek Officer's Disciplinary Records
headline.main: Holmes Lawyers Seek Officer's Disciplinary Records

lead_paragraph: Defense attorneys in the Colorado theater shooting case want to see disciplinary records of a police officer who was working on the day of the attack, but the reason wasn't immediately clear.
